name: A Slimes Journey
description:
You are a slime, working your way through a treacherous cavern, trying to make your way back home to The Slime King. Be careful, you have one life, and every tool you get to help you along the way also has a drawback, use them carefully.

Controls

  • A/D = Move
  • Space = Jump
  • S = Look Down
  • E = Drop Item
  • R = Restart
  • Esc = Quit

This was made for the Half Decent Studios Game Jam #1.

Theme: Sacrifices Must Be Made

All work was done by me. I'd appreciate any feedback you can provide in the comments below. Thank you for supporting my work!
